Group - Class in MyContacts
This class creates object Group and contains all methods that deals with this object. Object Group represents a group of contacts. Object Group attributes : *User name : the user which this group of contacts belongs to. *Group name : name of the group. *Contact list : list of contacts at this group. *Path : path of the file *.txt that contains all the contacts.
Group() - Constructor for class MyContacts.Group
 
Group(String, String, Contact[]) - Constructor for class MyContacts.Group
Creates new file named with the name of the group.
